posts.post_title: FS: T205 Hauser, Oakes, and Wiltse
posts.post_content:
The following T205s are for sale. $45 for the lot, or individual prices as listed below. Paypal F/F. Please add $3 shipping per order.

Hauser (SGC A) - $20
Oakes (SGC A) - $20
Wiltse - $10 (note that the Wiltse has a lot of back loss, and is near paper thin in parts)
